name: weightwatchers.com focus
description: Hide the extra stuff on the weightwatchers.com page so that you can just see and enter your daily stats. Install this user style to modify https://cmx.weightwatchers.com/my-day
additional_info: I like tracking at the desktop website because it is faster than the app, however, I hate how it is constantly using up space to tell me to download the app, and how it clutters up the space with things not related to tracking. So I created this user style to clean things up.
